PlaceOrderCompletedEvent.name: PlaceOrderCompletedEvent
PlaceOrderCompletedEvent.description: Notifies subscribers of an order being created or updated by invoking the Place Order API or the Place Sales Transaction API.

AppUsageTypes.description: Tag that represents the application that's using the order and determines how an order is processed. For example, the AppUsageTypes field value for Revenue Cloud orders is RevenueLifecycleManagement.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message.

HasErrors.description: Indicates whether errors occurred when creating or updating the order (true) or not (false).

ReplayId.description: Represents an ID value that is populated by the system and refers to the position of the event in the event stream. Replay ID values arenâ€™t guaranteed to be contiguous for consecutive events. A subscriber can store a replay ID value and use it on resubscription to retrieve missed events that are within the retention window.

RequestIdentifier.description: ID of the request that triggered the event.
